text: Rachid Sfar (11 September 1933 - 20 July 2023) was a Tunisian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Tunisia from July 1986 to October 1987 working for President Habib Bourguiba. He was born in Mahdia, Tunisia. Sfar died on 20 July 2023 at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Tunisia Category:Speakers of the Assembly of the Representatives of the People
title: Rachid Sfar
